name: G.T. - The Gun-Toting Extra Terrestrial
description:
This was written for the Shacknews Jam: The Third in 2019.  The theme of the jam is "__________ with guns".  I stumbled around trying to think of a game that didn't have guns, and it occurred to me that remixing the reviled 2600 classic E.T. would be a great fit.  

Just like the original game, you have to pick up all the pieces to G.T.'s gun, and kill agents until your ship arrives.  

Well, maybe not just like the original game...
